name: In-stab-ility
description:
Presentation

In a world full of noises, stress and aggressions, everything bother us, but will you become insane ? That's the question. There is only one possibility : You must not be out of control.

In this game you are a guy with some mental troubles.
Find your six pills but be careful, the world is very stressful for you. During your anxiety attack, you are out of control.

Try not to stab anyone.

Controls

Control only with arrow keys.

Credits

This game was made during the GMTK GameJam 2020 in 48h.
Some sprites are from the Kenney's RPG Urban Pack : https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-urban-pack (house, road, tree)
All the rest (Character, sound, codes, ...) have been made during the jam.
